summary: Set in the golden era of Grand Prix Racing '1' tells the story of a generation of charismatic drivers who raced on the edge, risking their lives during Formula 1's deadliest period, and the men who stood up and changed the sport forever.
cast: Michael Fassbender|Lewis Hamilton|Niki Lauda|Michael Schumacher|Jackie Stewart|Sebastian Vettel|Mario Andretti|Emerson Fittipaldi|Jenson Button|Sid Watkins|Bernie Ecclestone|Eddie Jordan|Nigel Mansell|Damon Hill|Robert Kubica|Martin Brundle|John Surtees|Jody Scheckter|Max Mosley|Brett Lunger|Jacky Ickx|Nina Rindt|Herbie Blash|Sally Swart|Jane Birbeck|Koen Vergeer|John Barnard|Lord Hesketh|Freddie Hunt|Roy Topp|Paddy McNally|Maurice Hamilton|John Miles|Clive Chapman|Jo Ramírez|Nigel Roebuck|Eddie Dennis|John Hogan|Colin Chapman|Brigitte Hill|John Watson|François Cevert|Enzo Ferrari|James Hunt|Ronnie Peterson|Peter Revson|Ayrton Senna|Roger Williamson
keywords: year 1978|hockenheim|car accident|woman wears a bikini|digit in title
